title: EdelweissFE: A light-weight, platform-independent, parallel finite element framework
description: EdelweissFE is a light-weight, platform-independent, parallel finite element framework. By default, it makes use of the Marmot library for finite element and constitutive model formulations. It aims to be an easy-to-understand yet efficient environment for developing finite elements and constitutive models, a flexible tool for coupled problems and special techniques, and an efficient tool for nonlinear simulations up to medium sized problems (~10^5 DOFs). Documentation: https://edelweissfe.github.io/EdelweissFE/.

creators.name: Dummer, Alexander
creators.affiliation: University of Innsbruck;University of Colorado Boulder
